applications.dataset_used: Kaggle Credit Card Fraud Detection Dataset
applications.key_findings: Feature selection methods based on importance values outperform those based on SHAP values across classifiers and various feature subset sizes.
applications.recommendation: For larger datasets and more intricate models, it is recommended to use the model's built-in feature importance list as the primary feature selection method over SHAP.
applications.limitations: Study limited to one dataset; computational time for SHAP is higher compared to other feature importance methods.
applications.future_work_suggestions: Explore these two feature selection methods across diverse application domains.
